garage.gameStart:
You awaken to find yourself in a strange room...
You have no idea where you are or how you got here.
You rub your eyes and look around to see the room only has one door.
On the left side of the room is a small table with what seems to be a note sitting on it.
garage.note:
Welcome to Eric's house!
	Find your way through the rooms to escape. Each room has a locked door
	that will take you to the next room. It can be unlocked by solving the
	challenge of that room.
	Oh, I almost forgot.
	Eric is also here and he’s looking for you.
	It would be in your best interest to not let him find you.
	The more attempts it takes to solve a challenge the more likely it is
	he stumbles into the same room.
	GOOD LUCK!
garage.poster:
What a cool collection of posters.
Looks like you and Eric have the same taste in movies,
 too bad he's trying to catch you.
garage.car:
This is a pretty cool ride
Looks like Eric's family Station Wagon.
You try the handle but the car is locked.
garage.dresser:
I like this dresser, such a great use of storage!
Oh and look A FROGGIE IS ON TOP OF ONE OF THEM!
garage.door:
You better read that note before you head forward
Probably has some nifty tips
garage.glasses:
You found your glasses!!
How'd they end up here?
garage.askShaq:
What's up, I'm Shaq!
I'm here to help guide you out of Eric's house.
To get started, why don't you try inspecting that table 
to your left and reading that note.
garage.help:
E: interacts with the game.
WASD:helps you move.
Music on:M 
Music off:N
garage.invalidCommand: That command is invalid! Please choose a proper command from the list.

kitchen.enterRoom:
Welcome to Room 1 - Knife Room:
To your left you see a bookshelf.
To your right you see a table.
Straight ahead is the locked door to the next room.
kitchen.fridge:
Always knock on the fridge before opening.
Just in case there is a salad dressing
kitchen.cabinet:
As my wife opened the cabinet,
a coffee cup crashed on her head
It's awful to see someone you love mugged.
kitchen.oven:
Tried to follow a recipe,
it said for a bigger portion just double everything,
but my oven doesn’t go up to 600 degrees.
kitchen.pears:
#TheBestFruit!
These are going to be helpful later on.
kitchen.oranges:
Doing all this dev work..
Need that vitamin C.
kitchen.knife:
This is a nice shiny knife
Should only be used for veggies and doors.

door.locked:
There's a note on the door.
'The door sticks sometimes...
I've been using a knife to jimmy it open'
door.unlocked:
You use the knife to jimmy open the lock.
The door opens and you proceed to the next room...

kitchen.chair: No time to sit and dwell!
kitchen.house-plant: I promise I won't let you die this time.
kitchen.askShaq:
To figure out what the room challenge is,
try to open the locked door.
Make sure you look for helpfuld items in every room.
Maybe the note on that table can offer up a clue.
kitchen.invalidCommand: That command is invalid! Please choose a proper command from the list.
kitchen.help:
E: interacts with the game.
WASD:helps you move.
Music on:M 
Music off:N

living-room.enterRoom:
Welcome to Room 2 - Word Order Room:
To your left you see a table.
To your right you see a desk.
You also see something shiny on the floor in front of you.
Straight ahead is the locked door to the next room.
living-room.askShaq:
Those are some random objects in this room.
Perhaps the order of the objects doesn't have 
anything to do with the items themselves...
living-room.invalidCommand: That command is invalid! Please choose a proper command from the list.
living-room.dresser: I bet he hides the bodies here.
living-room.bookshelf: All his books are written by Stephen King
living-room.fireplace:
AHHH A HAND,
Wait no that's just a log...
living-room.coffee-table:
I hate it when a murder chases me and
then I stub my toe on a table.
living-room.couch: I shouldn't sit at a time like this!
living-room.cushion-cat: He sure does love his animals!
living-room.help:
E: interacts with the game.
WASD:helps you move.
Music on:M 
Music off:N
living-room.sleeping-dog:
The dog grumbles.
You see a note next to the dog
'To get him to move you have to give him items
In the right order'

bedroom.enterRoom:
You made it Room 3 - The Riddle Room:
In this room you will need to solve 3 riddles in order to advance to the next room, good luck

car-toy.riddle:
You inspect the car and find a note.
What gets wetter the more it dries?

answers.correctOut:
You have correctly answered this question
The car beeps with joy!
answers.falseOut:
You have chosen the wrong answer
Think about a sponge or something...

bird.riddle:
The bird tweets at you...
How many letters are in The Alphabet?

answers.correctOut:
You have correctly answered this question
'The Alphabet' DOES have 11 letters!
Good luck on your journey SQWAAAAWK
answers.falseOut:
You have chosen the wrong answer
Hint: Try thinking about it another way

bear-plushie.riddle:
The bear grumbles....
What's the question you can never answer yes to?

answers.correctOut: That's the one, have a beary good day!
answers.falseOut:
You have chosen the wrong answer
Hint: Can't answer at this time.

door.locked:
Look through the items in the room.
They have riddles for you to answer.
Solve the three riddles to open this door.
door.unlocked: You have successfully completed all 3 Riddles in the room, you may advance to the next room

bedroom.askShaq:
Think about your answers,
if you answer incorrectly, you will lose time
bedroom.side-table-girl: That's a cute side-table, nice and pink!
bedroom.side-table-boy: That's a cute side-table, nice and blue!
bedroom.bed:
It would be nice to rest, but you don't have time
ERIC IS COMING!
bedroom.toys: You wish you had a cool chest like this for your toys.
bedroom.play-desk:
This desk is perfect for coloring.
Maybe later.
bedroom.play-chair:
It would be nice to rest, but you don't have time
ERIC IS COMING!
bedroom.football:
Footballs alright
But you would rather be exploring caves.
bedroom.star-plushie: Wow that's a lot of plushies for a murderer.
bedroom.blocks:
The blocks spell out.
I.M.C.O.M.I.N.G.F.O.R.Y.O.U
You wonder what 'I, M.C. Omingfo ryou' means
M.C Oming seems like a nice guy
bedroom.help:
E: interacts with the game.
WASD:helps you move.
Music on:M 
Music off:N

david-mirror.info: Lets play rock paper scissors! Best two out of three wins!

bathroom.shelves: He must love to decorate sheeesh
bathroom.bathroom-sink: At least he cleans his hands after!
bathroom.enterRoom:
Welcome to Room 4 - Game Room:
An anvil sits in the middle of the room
To your right is a big storage shelf full of odds and ends
To your left you see an old dresser
Straight ahead is the locked door to the next room.
bathroom.openDoorUnlocked:
YOU WIN! The door opens and you feel the cool breeze of fresh air on your face.
You step outside the house and realize you have escaped.You have escaped Eric!
bathroom.askShaq:
That is no ordinary mirror on the door... 
I think its somehow reading your mind!
If you can find a way to keep it out of your head 
I bet you can beat it!
bathroom.help:
E: interacts with the game.
WASD:helps you move.
Music on:M 
Music off:N

E: interacts with the game.
WASD: helps you move.

ericAppears:
Eric Appeared!!!!
He lunges at you violently at full speed with crackhead like energy.
 He picks you up as if you were a toy AND HE GIVES YOU A hug :)
Eric asks why you were running through his house? Turns out, he just wanted to talk to you. He just wanted a friend.
